meanings.sent1: The cat ingests its food quickly.
meanings.sent2: She ingests a healthy breakfast every morning.
meanings.sent3: The robot ingests data to learn new things.
meanings.sent4: The sponge ingests water and expands.
meanings.sent5: The plant ingests sunlight to grow.

meanings.definition: Absorb or assimilate substances into the body
meanings.sent1: The roots of the tree ingests nutrients from the soil.
meanings.sent2: Our bodies ingests vitamins and minerals from food.
meanings.sent3: The superhero ingests a potion to gain superpowers.
meanings.sent4: The organization ingests new ideas to stay innovative.
meanings.sent5: The sponge ingests liquid and swells up.
